#summary Description of an ApolloService

= Introduction =

An ApolloService is a central service that hosts at least one SimulationService.  The ApolloService can optionally host at least one VisualizationService.

End User Applications talk to an Apollo service, which then sends requests to SimulationServices or VisualizationServices.
